biotools.summary:
Simple and sharable visualisation of single-cell gene expression data.

ShinyCell is a R package that allows users to create interactive Shiny-based web applications to visualise single-cell data via (i) visualising cell information and/or gene expression on reduced dimensions e.g. UMAP, (ii) visualising the distribution of continuous cell information e.g. nUMI / module scores using violin plots / box plots and (iii) visualising the expression of multiple genes using bubbleplots / heatmap.
